EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's call (1563555926.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Denise,
I hope all is well with you today and thank you for your time on the phone with me. As I said if there is anything that I can assist with please feel free to reach out to me as I am your Account Manager with Grand & Toy. Thanks again and I hope you have a great weekend.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
